channel.title: Why these NPC'S Don't works?
channel.description: Hey all, when i'm go to the Varrock On my server (718 i think, Zenith source). Npc didn't work. I go in the range shop. Press on the NPC, and i got message like this: "Nothink intresting happens" What i have done to that NPC works? Please Help! And this message i get when i press on the all npc's in varrock?

item.title: Why these NPC'S Don't works?
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“Owned_Pl0xs, post:3, topic:465800”]Search for the text “Nothing interesting happens” within your source code
Theres probably some default case that says if said NPC isn’t handled it’ll return that message
Simply add an exception for the NPC ID for the NPC Option packet to do whatever action you want it to do
Not rocket science…[/quote]
yes. yes it is rocket science.

Read full topic

item.title: Why these NPC'S Don't works?
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Search for the text “Nothing interesting happens” within your source code
Theres probably some default case that says if said NPC isn’t handled it’ll return that message
Simply add an exception for the NPC ID for the NPC Option packet to do whatever action you want it to do
Not rocket science…

Read full topic

item.title: Why these NPC'S Don't works?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

It sounds like a Default which it reverts to if there’s no content implemented for the N.P.C.

Read full topic
